summary: SWOT involves strategic planning to identify strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats in startups or personal growth. The focus is on aligning misaligned aspects to foster resilience, self-awareness, confidence, and resource acquisition. Key areas include conducting SWOT analysis, strategic networking, and formulating critical asks.
excerpt: Aligning the Misaligned involves a journey of growth and strategic planning. Discovering personal strengths builds confidence and direction. Embracing weaknesses fosters resilience and self-awareness.
